thread.title: Bigg Boss 9 contestant Rimi Sen wants the next season of the show to be BANNED
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss 9 contestant Rimi Sen wants the next season of the show to be BANNED

author: Maggie Davis
title: Bigg Boss 9 contestant Rimi Sen wants the next season of the show to be BANNED
text:
Bigg Boss 9 contestant Rimi Sen wants the next season of the show to be BANNED By Maggie Davis on October 20, 2015 at 3:12 PM Comments The first elimination round that happened was an interesting part of the Bigg Boss 9 show. The host of the show Salman Khan did grill the contestants with his new way of asking the questions. Few days ago we did update you that Kishwar Merchant is scared of the handsome hunk Salman. Suyyash Raiâ€™s girlfriend fears Salman because of his weird way of asking questions during weekends and that is why she said, she is mentally prepared for the best and for the worst. Bigg Boss is the most loved show. People literally wait for the show most importantly to see who the celebrities are participating in this most controversial show. But it looks like one of the present contestants in the show is unhappy and regrets taking part in this dramatic show. According to media reports, B-town actress Rimi Sen does not want the nation to vote for her. We all know that she has just been saved from the first elimination. (ALSO READ: Bigg Boss 9, October 16: Suyyash-Prince and Rochelle-Rimi are the new partners decided by captains Vikas-Yuvika) The Bong beauty even stated that the next season of Bigg Boss should be BANNED. Could you believe that Rimi actually wants this show to be banned? Rimi who was not seen in recent years in any films has gained fame through this reality show. According to media reports, the actress says that once she is out of the show she would tell the people that NOT to participate in this show. Now by putting forth such comments is that the way for her to stay in the show for a long time, only time will tell. But we must say that Rimi has surely started entertaining the nation. (ALSO READ: Bigg Boss 9 gossip: Rimi Sen thinks the show is fake?) 
  3:12 PM Topics:
